summary: Most people don't contract with professionals without checking their past performance. Since the government spends billions of dollars on contracts, it's even more important for agencies to have accurate information on whether contractors are reliable before deciding to work with them. Where do they get it? Agencies are supposed to report on contractor performance and conduct. But between FY 2019-2023, agency personnel didn't always report...
title: Federal Contractors: Actions Needed to Improve Quality of Performance and Integrity Data
